items.title: Catedral de San Patricio y San Colman
items.description: Una visita tranquila con arquitectura clasica y vistas bonitas en el centro.

items.title: Paseo por el canal
items.description: Camina al atardecer o por la manana para un plan relajado cerca del agua.

items.title: Tiendas y cafes en el centro
items.description: Opciones para comer algo, comprar y descansar entre planes.

items.title: Bessbrook
items.description: Un pueblo con historia industrial y calles tranquilas para pasear.

items.title: Slieve Gullion Forest Park
items.description: Senderos y miradores para una salida corta en la naturaleza.

items.title: Vistas al Carlingford Lough
items.description: Paisajes costeros y aire fresco para una tarde relajada.

items.title: Museo de Newry
items.description: Una parada rapida para conocer la historia local.

items.title: Cafes y brunch
items.description: Ideal para desayunar o tomar cafe antes de salir.

items.title: Pubs tradicionales
items.description: Un plan tranquilo para tomar algo por la noche.

items.title: Ruinas y sitios historicos
items.description: Opciones para una visita corta si te gusta la historia.

video.heading: Mucho por descubrir
video.message: Hay muchas cosas que hacer en Newry y sus alrededores. Sientete libre de explorar los sitios hermosos.

en.title: What to do in Newry

items.title: Cathedral of Saint Patrick and Saint Colman
items.description: A calm visit with classic architecture and scenic views in the center.

items.title: Canal walk
items.description: Walk at sunset or in the morning for a relaxed plan by the water.

items.title: Shops and cafes downtown
items.description: Easy options for a bite, shopping, and a break between plans.

items.title: Bessbrook
items.description: A historic mill village with calm streets to stroll.

items.title: Slieve Gullion Forest Park
items.description: Trails and viewpoints for a short nature outing.

items.title: Carlingford Lough views
items.description: Coastal scenery and fresh air for an easy afternoon.

items.title: Newry Museum
items.description: A quick stop to learn about local history.

items.title: Cafes and brunch
items.description: Great for breakfast or coffee before exploring.

items.title: Traditional pubs
items.description: A relaxed plan for a drink in the evening.

items.title: Ruins and historic sites
items.description: Short visits if you are into local history.

video.heading: So much to explore
video.message: There are many things to do in Newry and the surrounding area. Feel free to explore the beautiful sites.
